sentence.Network_en: He was Brentford's defensive star in pluckily holding out the determined Reading raids for long periods.
sentence.Network_cn: 他是布伦特福德队的防守明星,长期坚持抗击雷丁队的猛攻.

sentence.Network_en: A crushing setback, pluckily overcome, is a good plot motif to carry the yarn forward.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果你的公司曾遭受过一次毁灭性的打击, 但你的勇气让公司度过了难关, 那么这个情节也很不错,能推动故事的发展.

auth_sentence.content: The big earth is dully pulling the apple and the apple is pluckily pulling on the earth.
